about_the_game:
Take the role of the Doctor once more with this new Chapter that fits in the main story of the game.

When you hire Max Poulsen as your co-worker, he will bring to your attention that his two daughters are also studying medicine at college, and he asks you whether you can help them with their studies. The problem is that the two girls' interest in biology isn't purely academic!

Features:
  • 4-5 hours of brand-new, playable story
  • 2 new medical examinations
  • A new romance option for the doctor
  • 2 new music tracks
  • A lot of new images
  • New sex scenes
  • New teaching mechanic: strip learning!

In order to play the content of this DLC you need to hire Max Poulsen in the clinic, that will unlock the content in the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Medical-related nudity, sexual intercourse, full frontal nudity, suggestive theme.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

name: General Practitioner: Teaching Medicine

  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
